articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Shreyas Iyer to miss entire ODI series against Australia, confirms Indian fielding coach T Dilip - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Middle-order batter Iyer has been ruled out of the entire three-match series between India and Australia. In the absence of all-format skipper Rohit, all-rounder Hardik Pandya will lead the Virat Kohli-starrer side in the 1st ODI against Australia at the Wank…
articles.content: India have suffered a massive blow in the form of premier batter Shreyas Iyer, who will miss the entire One Day International (ODI) series against Australia. Middle-order batter Iyer has been ruled o… [+2151 chars]
